DOC.brief_summary: A registry study to identify the patient-diagnosis-treatment characteristic profile of patients with bipolar disorder in Turkey.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Patient Characteristics and Treatment Approaches to Patients With Bipolar Disorder in Turkey
DOC.criteria: Patients previously or currently diagnosed with bipolar disorder Patients (or any of their relatives) who give a written informed consent. Patients who were previously included in this study.
